resources.string: What do you need help with?
How do I connect this app to a PC?
You need to have the server app installed and running on your PC for the two devices to be able to communicate.
How to know what IP and port to enter?
Don\'t freak out just yet! The server side app will automatically generate those values for you. Upon running the server app, simply enter the displayed values into the mobile app login screen.
How do I disconnect from my PC?
You can do this a few ways; you can press the \'back\' button on your device, or you can navigate to the menu where you can click the \'disconnect\' button.
How do I enter keyboard input?

To enter keyboard input to your connected PC, simply tap on the top-middle text entry field marked with a prompt. From here, you can type your input and tap the Enter button to the right. This will send your text to the PC and close the virtual keyboard on screen. Press the Enter button again (with empty input) to register the enter key on the PC.
